snippet.title: Berzerk Recharged - Announcement Trailer
snippet.description:
Outrun Evil Otto. Grab your blaster and navigate through these endless mazes in Berzerk: Recharged, the newest title in Atari's Recharged series. Can you survive, chicken? 

Wishlist Berzerk: Recharged: https://link.atari.com/wishlist-berzerk

Join the conversation on Discord: https://link.atari.com/discord

Follow Atari
Twitter: https://twitter.com/atari
Facebook: https://www.facebook.com/atari
Instagram: https://www.instagram.com/atari/
